channel.title: Richard Safier on ₿itcoin Transcripts
channel.description: Recent content in Richard Safier on ₿itcoin Transcripts

item.title: How to become Signet Rich: Learn about Bitcoin Signet and Zebnet
item.description: Richard: So today we are going to talk about Signet Lightning, PlebNet Playground, which was the first evolution of me playing with custom Signets, and eventually ZebNet Adventures. This is how you can become Signet-rich. First, we should probably do an overview of the various network types. Everybody knows about Mainnet. This is what we use day to day, but there’s a few other testing networks. RegTest, or SimNet, if you are running BTCD, is a local unit testing framework.
